question: [File: aptos-core/protos/rust/src/pb/aptos.transaction.v1.serde.rs] [Function: UserTransactionRequest::deserialize()] [Expiration bypass] At line 8209, expiration_timestamp_secs is optional - can an attacker omit expiration to create transactions with no time limit, enabling delayed replay attacks or indefinite pending transactions?
